å›¾ç‰‡ä¸Šä¼ ç»„ä»¶å°è£… #

åŸºäº uView çš„ u-upload ç»„ä»¶è¿›è¡ŒäºŒæ¬¡å°è£…ï¼Œå®ç°å¯å¤ç”¨çš„å›¾ç‰‡ä¸Šä¼ ç»„ä»¶ã€‚

æ€è·¯åˆ†æ #

  • ç”¨æˆ·é€‰æ‹©å›¾ç‰‡åè§¦å‘ç»„ä»¶çš„ afterRead äº‹ä»¶
  • è°ƒç”¨ uni.uploadfile äº‹ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ å›¾ç‰‡
  • ä¸Šä¼ æˆåŠŸä¿å­˜åˆ°æ•°ç»„å†…ï¼Œä¸Šä¼ å¤±è´¥å¼¹å‡ºæç¤º
  • é€šè¿‡çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶ä¼ é€’çš„å‚æ•°åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦è¦æ˜¾ç¤ºåˆ é™¤æŒ‰é’®ï¼ˆä¸€èˆ¬ç”¨äºè¯¦æƒ…å’Œç¼–è¾‘åŠŸèƒ½å¤ç”¨çš„åœºæ™¯ï¼‰

æ€»ä½“ä»£ç  #

vue
<template>
	<view>
		<u-toast ref="uToast" />
		<u-upload :fileList="fileList" @afterRead="successFn" @delete="removeFn" :deletable="!disabled" name="1" multiple :maxCount="10"></u-upload>
	</view>
</template>

<script>
	import {
		BASE_URL,
		IMG_URL
	} from "../../config";
	export default {
		props: {
			disabled: {
				type: Boolean,
				default: false
			}
		},
		data() {
			return {
				action: BASE_URL + "/public/save",
				fileList: [],
				dataList: [],
				headers: {
					"X-Access-Token": uni.getStorageSync('token'),
				},
			};
		},
		methods: {
			// æ·»åŠ å›¾ç‰‡ + æˆåŠŸå›è°ƒ
			async successFn(file) {
				let length = this.fileList.length
				this.fileList.push({
					url: file.file[0].url,
					status: 'uploading',
					message: 'ä¸Šä¼ ä¸­'
				});
				const res = await this.uploadFilePromise(file.file[0].url)
				if (res.code === 200) {
					this.$set(this.fileList, length, {
						url: IMG_URL + res.data,
						status: 'success',
						message: 'ä¸Šä¼ æˆåŠŸ'
					})
					this.$set(this.dataList, length, {
						url: res.data,
						status: 'success',
						message: 'ä¸Šä¼ æˆåŠŸ'
					})
				}
				
				this.$emit('uploadSuccessFn', this.dataList)
			},
			// ä¸Šä¼ å›¾ç‰‡
			uploadFilePromise(url) {
				return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
					uni.uploadFile({
						url: this.action,
						filePath: url,
						name: 'file',
						header: {
							"X-Access-Token": uni.getStorageSync('token'),
						},
						success: (res) => {
							setTimeout(() => {
								resolve(JSON.parse(res.data))
							}, 1000)
						},
						fail: (err) => {
							setTimeout(() => {
								reject(err)
							}, 1000)
						}
					});
				})
			},
			// åˆ é™¤æˆåŠŸå›è°ƒ
			removeFn(event) {
				this.fileList.splice(event.index, 1)
				this.dataList.splice(event.index, 1)
				this.$emit('uploadSuccessFn', this.dataList)
			},
		},
	};
</script>

çŸ¥è¯†æ‹“å±• #

åœ¨å°ç¨‹åºå’Œappä¸­ï¼Œæ— æ³•é€šè¿‡ä»¥ä¸‹æ–¹å¼æ”¶é›† formData å½¢å¼çš„æ•°æ®ï¼š

javascript
letÂ formData =Â newÂ FormData()
formData.append('file', file.url)
console.log(formData.get('file'))

å¦‚æœä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œä¼šæŠ¥é”™ FormData is not defined. ã€‚æ­¤æ—¶å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ uView æä¾›çš„ upload ç»„ä»¶é…åˆ uni.uploadFile æ–¹æ³•è·å– formData å½¢å¼çš„æ•°æ®ã€‚ å‚æ•°é…ç½®å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

  1. urlï¼šæ¥å£åœ°å€
  2. filePathï¼šè·å–çš„æ–‡ä»¶
  3. nameï¼šåç«¯è¦æ±‚çš„å‚æ•°åç§°
  4. formDataï¼šåç«¯è¿˜è¦å…¶ä»–çš„å‚æ•°ï¼Œå†™åœ¨è¿™é‡Œ
  5. headerï¼šè¯·æ±‚å¤´ï¼Œä¸€èˆ¬è®¾ç½® token ã€‚

æ€»ä½“ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

javascript
uni.uploadFile({
  url:Â 'http://192.168.2.21:7001/upload',Â // è¿™é‡Œæ”¹ä¸ºè‡ªå·±çš„æ¥å£åœ°å€
  filePath: url,Â // è·å–çš„æ–‡ä»¶
  name:Â 'file',Â // åç«¯è¦æ±‚çš„å‚æ•°åç§°
  formData: {Â // å¦‚æœåç«¯è¿˜è¦å…¶ä»–çš„å‚æ•°ï¼Œå†™åœ¨è¿™é‡Œ
    user:Â 'test'
  },
  // æˆåŠŸçš„å›è°ƒ
  success:Â (res) =>Â {
    setTimeout(() =>Â {
      resolve(res.data.data)
    },Â 1000)
  }
})
